composeFileTemplateContent:
version: "2"

services:
  ${oxidized.container_name}:
    restart: always
    image: oxidized/oxidized:latest
    ports:
      - ${port}:8888/tcp
    environment:
      CONFIG_RELOAD_INTERVAL: 600
    volumes:
      - ${volume}:/root/.config/oxidized
    networks:
      nmaas-ext-access:
      nmaas-dcn:
        ipv4_address: ${oxidized.container_ip_address}
    privileged: true

networks:
  nmaas-ext-access:
    external:
      name: ${nmaas_ext_access_network}
  nmaas-dcn:
    external:
      name: ${nmaas_dcn_network}
